00019 class CsgTestApp
00020     : public CsgApplication
00021 {
00022     string ProgramName() { return "template_nblist"; }
00023     void HelpText(ostream &out) { out << "rough template for rdf calculations"; }
00024 
00025     void Initialize();
00026 
00027     bool DoTrajectory() {return true;}
00028 
00029     void BeginEvaluate(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref);
00030     void EvalConfiguration(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref);
00031     void EndEvaluate();
00032 
00033 protected:
00034     HistogramNew _rdf;
00035     double _cut_off;
00036 
00037 };
00038 
00039 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00040 {
00041     CsgTestApp app;
00042 
00043     return app.Exec(argc, argv);
00044 }
00045 
00046 void CsgTestApp::EvalConfiguration(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref)
00047 {
00048     BeadList b;
00049     b.Generate(*top, "*");
00050     NBListGrid nb;
00051     nb.setCutoff(_cut_off);
00052     nb.Generate(b);
00053     NBList::iterator i;
00054     for(i=nb.begin(); i!=nb.end(); ++i)
00055         _rdf.Process((*i)->dist());
00056 }
00057 
00058 void CsgTestApp::Initialize()
00059 {
00060     CsgApplication::Initialize();
00061     AddProgramOptions("RDF options")
00062              ("c", boost::program_options::value<double>()->default_value(1.0), "the cutoff");
00063 }
00064 
00065 void CsgTestApp::BeginEvaluate(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref)
00066 {
00067     _cut_off = OptionsMap()["c"].as<double>();
00068     _rdf.Initialize(0, _cut_off, 50);
00069 }
00070 
00071 void CsgTestApp::EndEvaluate()
00072 {
00073     _rdf.data().Save("rdf.dat");
00074 }
